docs.lead_paragraph: Kaylan Pickford is a fashion model who readily admits that she is 53 years old. She wears the lines on her face proudly, and has not attempted to cover the white-on-gray hair that has helped give her what is known in the modeling business as ''a look.'' Today Miss Pickford is probably the most successful midlife model in America. She is one of the few models her age who have posed for such so-called ''glamour products'' as cosmetics, diamond rings, hair coloring products and health foods, and she also played a psychiatrist's wife in the recent movie ''Lovesick,'' starring Dudley Moore.

headline.main: MODEL, 53, IS A RARE SUCCESS STORY

docs.snippet: Kaylan Pickford is a fashion model who readily admits that she is 53 years old. She wears the lines on her face proudly, and has not attempted to cover the white-on-gray hair that has helped give her what is known in the modeling business as ''a...

docs.lead_paragraph: Production of Bendectin, the only American-produced drug approved for the treatment of morning sickness, was halted by Merrell Dow Pharmaceuticals today. The company's move came 13 days after a jury awarded $750,000 to the family of a girl who was born with a deformed hand after her mother took the drug. The company, which says the product is ''absolutely safe,'' has been the target of hundreds of lawsuits asserting that the drug caused deformities in fetuses. But the award was the first major judgment against the Cincinnati-based company, a division of Dow Chemical.

headline.main: COMPANY STOPS MAKING MORNING SICKNESS DRUG
